description: JSON-RPC service provides APIs for client applications to submit transactions and query the diem blockchain.

panels.description:
This latency is recorded at JSON-RPC handler level without knowing what method is called. There are 2 types, batch and single requests.  
Batch request is total time for all methods call finished.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(diem_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{role=~"$role", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval])) by (owner, role, type, le))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request $requesttype Latency [P50]

panels.description:
This latency is recorded at JSON-RPC handler level without knowing what method is called. There are 2 types, batch and single requests.  
Batch request is total time for all methods call finished.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(diem_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{role=~"$role", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval])) by (owner, role, type, le))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request $requesttype Latency [P90]

panels.description:
This latency is recorded at JSON-RPC handler level without knowing what method is called. There are 2 types, batch and single requests.  
Batch request is total time for all methods call finished.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(diem_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{role=~"$role", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval])) by (owner, role, type, le))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(diem_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{role=~"$role", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval])) by (owner, role, type, le))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(rate(diem_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{role=~"$role", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval])) by (owner, role, type, le))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request $requesttype Latency [P90]

panels.description:
This latency is recorded at JSON-RPC handler level without knowing what method is called. There are 2 types, batch and single requests.  
Batch request is total time for all methods call finished.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(diem_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{role=~"$role", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval])) by (owner, role, type, le))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request $requesttype Latency [P99]

panels.description: The success rate of each json-rpc method

targets.expr: sum by (owner, role, method) (rate(diem_client_service_requests_count{role=~"$role", type=~"$requesttype", method=~"$method", result="success", owner=~"$owner"} [$interval]))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Method Success

panels.description: The rate of invalid requests, all client side errors.

targets.expr: sum by (owner, role, method, errortype) (rate(diem_client_service_invalid_requests_count{role=~"$role", type=~"$requesttype", method=~"$method", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval]))

panels.title: JSON-RPC method invalid requests

panels.description: Internal error rate, likely a bug if there is data show up.

targets.expr: sum by (role, owner, method, errorcode) (rate(diem_client_service_internal_error_count{role=~"$role", type=~"$requesttype", method=~"$method", owner=~"$owner"}[$interval]))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Method Internal Errors

panels.description:
Latency of each method, for batch type request, this is individual method process latency, not total. 
Check JSON-RPC Request Latency for total batch request processing latency.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(diem_client_service_method_latency_seconds_bucket{role=~"$role", owner=~"$owner",type=~"$requesttype", method=~"$method"}[$interval])) by (owner, role, type, method, le))

list.label: JSON-RPC Method
list.name: method
list.query: submit, get_account, get_account_transaction, get_account_transactions, get_transactions, get_events, get_metadata, get_currencies, get_state_proof, get_account_state_with_proof

title: JSON-RPC
